participant_1.name: Frank Thompson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, Frank enjoys engaging with his community and sharing stories.
participant_1.background: I enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days. I like to grill outdoors. I have been retired for a years. I go gambling in my spare time.

participant_2.name: Lily Carter
participant_2.personality: Imaginative and playful, Lily loves creating stories and playing with her toys.
participant_2.background: I have a pet turtle. I like to play with my dolls. I do not pick up my toys. My best friend lives next door.
